subject: RE: [junit] Can JUnit be used for GUI testing
msgSnippet: Selenium (http://www.openqa.org/selenium/) seems to be an interesting choice for testing web pages. It is designed based on JUnit. Andreas
messageBody:
Selenium (http://www.openqa.org/selenium/) seems to be an interesting
choice for testing web pages. It is designed based on JUnit.



Andreas



________________________________

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
suresh vittal
Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2006 8:44 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Can JUnit be used for GUI testing



Hi,

I need some information regarding JUnit. All I have heard is that
JUnit can and is used widely for unit testing the JAVA code.
Can the JUnit be used to test the GUI related applications? If so, how
can we use it for system testing of GUI applications.


Thanks and Regards,
Suresh
